archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0540
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to request a refund for invalid/incorrect charges made to my account, so that I can recover my funds.

properties.value: What kind of model it can be applied to? Can you please explain whole process? This should be a refund to the card if he was charged to the card initially. Customer should be able to request this in self service (maybe in the context of a payment?). The ticket mechanism could be used here. In some cases the refund may be processed automatically (with rules e.g. not used balance)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
